gridlayout 0.1.0
  • Reference

Convert layout to markdown table

to_md.Rd

Uses the `knitr::kable()` function to convert a layout object to a markdown table

to_md(layout, include_gap_size = TRUE)

Arguments

layout

Object of class `"gridlayout"`.
include_gap_size

Should the gap size for the layout be added in upper-left of table?

Value

Markdown table as constructed by `knitr::kable()` that defines the grid layout. This can be used with the function `grid_layout_from_md()` to build grid layouts.

Examples


start_table <- "
|      |        |       |       |
|:-----|:-------|:------|:------|
|10px  |120px   |1fr    |1fr    |
|100px |header  |header |header |
|1fr   |sidebar |plot_a |plot_c |
|1fr   |sidebar |plot_b |plot_b |"

my_layout <- md_to_gridlayout(layout_table = start_table)
table_text <- to_md(my_layout)

Contents

gridlayout is built for R Markdown, an ecosystem of packages for creating computational documents in R. Learn more at rmarkdown.rstudio.com.

Developed by Nick Strayer. Site built with pkgdown.
